Message.Msg: Ah shucks, as Barbara Bush once said "I don't trouble my beautiful mind...". She was talking about US troop deaths over her son's lies, but everyone here knows the 'Beze has launched 100 trolls, in their 1000s of IDs posting over a million posts, and they haven't accomplished one tiny thing (but wrecking their own families) so I guess I take my ownership of them for granted. I hope that helps.

Message.Title: Good Morning From Beautiful Philadelphia. Above Ground Gardening Of Course.
Message.Msg: Contrary to the melting fools who believe their own lies and misinformation, I'm very much alive and happy. I'm enjoying yet another summer off. I would not spin in my grave as I'm not there yet, and it would be highly inappropriate, much like whistling past the graveyard. I'm from Philadelphia where we celebrate freedom for all, not just for Flyktning's highly inappropriate daily melting free speech poster children. I hope that helps.

Topic.Title: Good Morning From Beautiful Philadelphia. Above Ground Gardening Of Course.
